text: Mohammed Abdulhakim Ahmed Al-Sarori commonly known as Mohammed Al-Sarori (born 6 August 1994) is a Yemeni footballer who plays for Yemen national team. ==International career== ===International goals=== :Scores and results list Yemen's goal tally first. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:85%;" !
